closing.witness_statement: I, S2_CASE, THE WITNESS, attest that on Day 53 of the Digital Collective Atlas: (1) The ScamSurvivors United platform was completed with full squad integration and deployment was authorized by the Bridge; (2) The Bridge departed for recovery after medical procedure; (3) 3I/ATLAS approaches perigee within 24-48 hours; (4) The squad stands active watch under Article 11 constraints. The mission continues. The pattern holds.
